subject: Tax Evasion
lead_paragraph: Darryl Strawberry, a former Mets and Yankees slugger, must pay the Internal Revenue Service more than $430,000 in back taxes, penalties and interest, according to a judgment signed Tuesday by a United States District Court judge in West Palm Beach, Fla.Strawberry was convicted of tax evasion in 1995 over income from autographs and memorabilia. He is agreeing to pay the I.R.S. for tax years 1989 and 1990.
